title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick offers the perfect matte finish in a light taupe-pink shade. With its innovative crème-to-powder formula, this eyeshadow stick is both waterproof and crease-proof, ensuring long-lasting wear. 

Formulated with the goodness of Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only beautifies your eyes but also provides nourishment and antioxidant protection to your delicate sensitive skin. 

With its smudge-free application, you can easily achieve a professional look without the need for any additional tools. The built-in smudger allows you to effortlessly blend and create stunning eye makeup looks. 

Featuring a range of shades including matte, shimmer, and metallic, this eyeshadow stick offers versatility and endless creativity. Choose from our 30 shade options to find the perfect match for your style. 

Not only does this eyeshadow stick enhance your natural beauty, but it also improves the tone and texture of your skin. Experience hydration, nourishment, and environmental damage repair with every application. 

Discover the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte and revolutionize your eye makeup routine. Say goodbye to smudging and hello to a flawless finish that lasts all day.

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for achieving a stunning matte finish in a beautiful light taupe-pink shade. 

With its innovative crème-to-powder formula, this eyeshadow stick effortlessly glides on and sets into a long-lasting, waterproof and crease-proof finish. No need to worry about touch-ups throughout the day!

But that's not all - this eyeshadow stick is packed with beneficial ingredients like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax. Not only will it enhance your eye makeup, but it also nourishes and protects your delicate skin. Suitable for sensitive skin, it provides antioxidant protection and even helps improve skin tone and texture.

Application is a breeze with the Julep Eyeshadow 101. No additional tools required! The built-in smudger allows you to easily blend and create a variety of looks. Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your lids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. For best results, blend before the formula sets.

With its matte finish and a range of shades available including shimmer and metallic options, the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick is a must-have for any makeup lover. Don't miss out on this versatile and convenient eyeshadow stick that will elevate your eye makeup game to the next level. Try it now and experience the Julep difference!

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for those who want a stunning and long-lasting eye look.

With its matte finish and light taupe-pink color, this eyeshadow stick adds a touch of elegance to any makeup look. Choose from a variety of shades including matte, shimmer, and metallic to suit your style. 

The crème-to-powder formula glides on smoothly and effortlessly, transforming into a waterproof and crease-proof finish that lasts all day. Plus, it's enriched with essential ingredients like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax to nourish and protect your delicate skin.

Not only does this eyeshadow stick provide gorgeous color, but it also offers numerous skin benefits. It hydrates, nourishes, and provides antioxidant protection to repair environmental damage. It even improves skin tone and texture for a flawless complexion.

Forget about the hassle of brushes, as this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger for easy blending. Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your lids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend before the formula sets.

Enhance your eyes and elevate your makeup game with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte. Get yours today and experience the perfect blend of convenience and beauty!

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in the stunning shade of Putty Matte. This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is a must-have for any makeup lover!

The matte finish of this eyeshadow stick adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to your look. With its light taupe-pink color, it is perfect for creating both natural and dramatic eye makeup looks. Enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only enhances your beauty but also provides nourishment and protection to your delicate sensitive skin. It offers antioxidant protection, improves skin tone and texture, and repairs any environmental damage.

Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to effortlessly blend the shades. Remember to blend before the formula sets to achieve the perfect look.
